name: Gems & Jewels - Quest Star Mania
description:
Fantastic jewel game with new elements, more strategy, more fun.

Match three or more jewels together and get more points, this game offer new style to play these kind of games.
This game gives you possibilities to move top jewels any direction you want and this give more strategy elements for this game.

Really fun puzzle game for everyone who love great puzzle games. Beautiful gems, jewels and great effects give polished look for this game.

Jewel lines rise up periodically and you have to smash every jewelry lines before any of these are touching top of screen. You can control jewels with your finger (touch and swipe left, right, up or down), it's very easy to play and this control style working great on this game.

If you really like gems and jewels games, this is perfect matching puzzle/strategy game for you.
It's fast, fun and challenging puzzle game and with new elements this game is totally new experience for you.

Sharp eyes and intelligent transfers can rise you top of the leaderboard, it's always fun to beat your friends or other players. One of the best free jewel games, we are almost sure, that you are love it!

[ How To Play ]
• destroy jewel lines before rise up to the top of screen
• touch and swipe control (left, right, up and down)

[ Features ]
• easy game play
• beautiful graphics
• responsive controls
• achievements
• leaderboard
